t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    x = input()
    y = input()
    count = 0
    a = len(x)
    b = len(y)
    j = 0
    k = 0
    while j != a and k != b:
        if x[j] == y[k] or x[j] == '?' or y[k] == '?':
            count += 1
            j += 1
            k += 1
        else:
            j += 1
            k += 1
    if count == a:
        print('Yes')
    else:
        print('No')
